name: Car Road Cross
description:
If you like traffic over the road games and extreme car games with traffic lights - you will love this game.

Like Many clicker games you have played but you never played the Cross the Road like this before looking for free car games and the racing you are in the right place. Enjoy the Cross the Road car driving use your mind and control your car at traffic when you feel the road is empty just move over and collect the coins and enjoy in fast & illegal traffic.

Cross The Road is not easy as you think. Ambulance has a high priority for a long time does not wait for the green light. Police hurry to reveal other bank accidents and traffic it is not an obstacle! A column of infantry combat vehicles are moving in the military training - they just cannot be late.
Now it’s your time to show your car driving skills become the car driving expert and traffic master. Many cars are available for your fun. Commute on the highway with traffic rules use the red light and the green light to become the professional driver in this amazing game.
